title: Momo Meets Moimoi Soiree
description: An innovative Soiree where Nepalese momos pair with Nigerian moimoi, merging culinary techniques from two distinct cultures in a delicious creative showcase.

title: Heritage & Harmony Workshop
description: Discover the secrets behind our fusion flavors in this interactive cooking workshop. Learn traditional Nepalese techniques and Nigerian spice blends from our chefs, and take home recipes to recreate the magic.

title: Heritage Rhythm & Dine
description: Enjoy an unforgettable night of fusion dining paired with live performances that blend Nepalese folk tunes with Nigerian rhythms. This recurring event brings a dynamic vibe every weekend.
price: $35 per person (on a first-come, first-serve basis)

title: Spice & Heritage Night
description: Immerse yourself in a vibrant evening of live drumming, traditional dance, and fusion diningâ€”where the heart of Nepalese heritage meets the bold spirit of Nigerian Afrobeat.

title: Flavors of the World Festival
description: Celebrate an immersive day-long festival bursting with multicultural flair. Enjoy interactive food stations, live cultural performances, and a lively atmosphere that highlights the best of our culinary fusion.

title: Fusion Feast Fiesta
description: Celebrate the rich tapestry of Nepalese spices and Nigerian flavors in a night of fusion delights, featuring special tasting menus and live traditional music.
